Hi Dear Fab_Michellonet:

1, I down source code zip file (efpatterns-181828c3b16f.zip) from codeplex web
2, I unzip the "efpatterns-181828c3b16f.zip"
3, Open the solution of EntityFramework.Patterns by Microsoft Visual Studio 2010
4,Build project of "EntityFramework.Patterns"
5,The error has happened:
